00012 #define __gtx_matrix_projection_inl__

00014 #include "gtx_matrix_projection.h"
00015 
00016 namespace glm
00017 {
00018     template <typename T> 
00019     inline _xmat4<T> perspectiveGTX(T fovy, T aspect, T zNear, T zFar)
00020     {
00021         T range = glm::tan(glm::radians(fovy / 2)) * zNear;     
00022         T left = -range * aspect;
00023         T right = range * aspect;
00024         T bottom = -range;
00025         T top = range;
00026 
00027         glm::_xmat4<T> Result(T(0));
00028         Result[0][0] = (2 * zNear) / (right - left);
00029         Result[1][1] = (2 * zNear) / (top - bottom);
00030         Result[2][2] = - (zFar + zNear) / (zFar - zNear);
00031         Result[2][3] = -1;
00032         Result[3][2] = - (2 * zFar * zNear) / (zFar - zNear);
00033         return Result;
00034     }
00035 
00036     template <typename T> 
00037     inline _xmat4<T> infinitePerspectiveGTX(T fovy, T aspect, T zNear)
00038     {
00039         T range = glm::tan(glm::radians(fovy / 2)) * zNear;     
00040         T left = -range * aspect;
00041         T right = range * aspect;
00042         T bottom = -range;
00043         T top = range;
00044 
00045         glm::_xmat4<T> Result(T(0));
00046         Result[0][0] = (2 * zNear) / (right - left);
00047         Result[1][1] = (2 * zNear) / (top - bottom);
00048         Result[2][2] = -1;
00049         Result[2][3] = -1;
00050         Result[3][2] = - 2 * zNear;
00051         return Result;
00052     }
00053 
00054     template <typename T> 
00055     inline _xmat4<T> tweakedInfinitePerspectiveGTX(T fovy, T aspect, T zNear)
00056     {
00057         T range = glm::tan(glm::radians(fovy / 2)) * zNear;     
00058         T left = -range * aspect;
00059         T right = range * aspect;
00060         T bottom = -range;
00061         T top = range;
00062 
00063         glm::_xmat4<T> Result(T(0));
00064         Result[0][0] = (2 * zNear) / (right - left);
00065         Result[1][1] = (2 * zNear) / (top - bottom);
00066         Result[2][2] = T(0.0001f) -1;
00067         Result[2][3] = -1;
00068         Result[3][2] = - (0.0001f - 2) * zNear;
00069         return Result;
00070     }
00071 
00072     template <typename T> 
00073     inline _xmat4<T> ortho2DGTX(T left, T right, T bottom, T top)
00074     {
00075         glm::_xmat4<T> Result(1);
00076         Result[0][0] = 2 / (right - left);
00077         Result[1][1] = 2 / (top - bottom);
00078         Result[3][0] = - (right + left) / (right - left);
00079         Result[3][1] = - (top + bottom) / (top - bottom);
00080         return Result;
00081     }
00082 
00083     template <typename T> 
00084     inline _xmat4<T> ortho3DGTX(T left, T right, T bottom, T top, T zNear, T zFar)
00085     {
00086         glm::_xmat4<T> Result(1);
00087         Result[0][0] = 2 / (right - left);
00088         Result[1][1] = 2 / (top - bottom);
00089         Result[2][2] = 2 / (zFar - zNear);
00090         Result[3][0] = - (right + left) / (right - left);
00091         Result[3][1] = - (top + bottom) / (top - bottom);
00092         Result[3][2] = - (zFar + zNear) / (zFar - zNear);
00093         return Result;
00094     }
00095 
00096     template <typename T, typename U> 
00097     _xvec3<T> projectGTX(const _xvec3<T>& obj, const _xmat4<T>& model, const _xmat4<T>& proj, const _xvec4<U>& view)
00098     {
00099         glm::_xvec4<T> v = proj * model * glm::_xvec4<T>(obj, 1);
00100         return glm::_xvec3<T>(T(view.x) + T(view.z) * (v.x + 1) / 2, T(view.y) + T(view.w) * (v.y + 1) / 2, (v.z + 1) / 2);
00101     }
00102 
00103     template <typename T, typename U> 
00104     _xvec3<T> unProjectGTX(const _xvec3<T>& win, const _xmat4<T>& model, const _xmat4<T>& proj, const _xvec4<U>& view)
00105     {
00106         glm::_xvec4<T> v(2 * (win.x - T(view.x)) / view.z - 1, 2 * (win.y - T(view.y)) / view.w - 1, 2 * win.z - 1, 1);
00107         return glm::_xvec3<T>(glm::inverseGTX(proj * model) * v);
00108     }
00109 }
